lenders.name: Andrew

If we all work together to create a better world, with an attitude of surrender to God's will, then anything is possible. I especially hope and pray that children all over the world will have enough to eat, a nice place to live, and good teachers and schools.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am studying software engineering. For several months out of each year, I work as a volunteer in the charitable projects of Amma, a saint and humanitarian from southern India. At other times, I drive a big truck across the USA and sometimes Canada.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to improve their lives in a sustainable way rather than giving them handouts that only help temporarily.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I saw the story about Kiva on Front Line and I was struck by how far a small amount of money can go toward lifting someone out of poverty.  Addressing global poverty is very important to me and this seems to be a great way to be a part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: During the week, I develop software for a huge American corporation.  On the weekends, I play drums for various local bands.

lenders.name: Frilly Lilly
lenders.occupation: We create Bath and Body Products
lenders.loan_because: Every business needs to start somewhere. Frilly Lilly believes in giving back and helping whenever possible. Kiva allows us to help small businesses and entrepreneurs all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Since the launch of their new dessert-inspired product line in September of 2005, Frilly Lilly has become an instant sensation both in Calgary and abroad, as the line was quickly picked up by Fred Segal in Santa Monica, Kitson in Los Angeles, as well as The Palms and The Wynn hotels in Las Vegas!

Debra Van Dyke, the visionary behind Frilly Lilly, opened the beauty boutique initially specializing in waxing, manicures, and pedicures. It was her vision to create "a product that does all the right things when we’re doing services but also smells wonderful and looks great on the side of your tub.” It was this approach that guided the development of the entire Frilly Lilly body care line, says Debra, whose team worked for two fun years creating and testing the products, letting the clientele of Frilly Lilly's Calgary flagship store to be the first to try them out.

The result is the whimsical and feminine frilly lilly line, featuring sensational 'flavors' and vintage-inspired packaging. With an assortment of treats from bath bombs shaped and hand decorated as an assortment of petits fours and cupcakes to a variety of body butters, lotions, lip products, and a line of exciting nail polishes, all of the products are used in the spa services at frilly lilly!

Debra oversees the frilly lilly product line as well as the beauty boutique along side her two children, Lisa and Jeremy. The frilly lilly boutique has been recognized as one of the best places for waxing in Calgary, and in addition to carrying their own product line, also carry the latest trends in accessories fit for any fashionista.

With the brand quickly expanding in Canada, the United States, and soon to be worldwide, there hasn’t been a better time to indulge without ever gaining a pound!

lenders.name: AkaWesley
lenders.occupational_info:
I had the chance to visit the field offices in Bolivia and see how Kiva works down there. After seeing what the loans accomplish close up, I've changed my loan strategy. Here are my new loaning principles:

1. Loan to catalytic loans with more potential for deeper impact like education loans, disaster relief, and loans in places that are truly excluded from the local banking system

2. Slowly moving money over to Kiva Zip where loans are truly zero interest to the borrower. Higher risk, but borrowers are not tied to high interest rates which is the whole purpose of my involvement here

3. Don't expect to receive repayments. If they fail to pay back, it's likely they couldn't. So they really needed the loan in the first place

4. Avoid any field offices with religious connections. I don't want to be part of their brainwashing.

5. Wish the best for all the borrowers! Your road is bumpier than mine but we'll all get where we were meant to go.

lenders.occupation: Venture Consultant (that is me in the gray tshirt)
lenders.loan_because: Pretty simple...a little goes a long way.  What equals a nice dinner for many of us equals a life changing catalyst for others.  If you could facilitate that kind of change with so little why wouldn\'t you???????
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology startups in Silicon Valley to help them launch and grow their business.  I love helping entrepreneurs succeed.  Kiva entrepreneurs need MUCH less money for MUCH more direct impact with less hand holding than a SV startup :)

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to improve their lives and the lives of others. This is a way to give them a hand up instead of a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a firm that designs roads, bridges, storm drainage and sanitary sewer improvements. I am a civil engineer and a land surveyor. I locate and mark out on the ground the property that people own. Often, we design the improvements that are made on that land.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: Getting investment capital to motivated people is a great way to break the cycle of generational poverty.

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.name: Sara and Tim

lenders.occupational_info: We work with people to help them achieve their dreams through realizing the great potential that is in them.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: As Danny Thomas once said, "Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It’s what you do for others."

lenders.name: Kirkwood
lenders.loan_because: To create economic opportunity by funding small entrepreneurial enterprises in less developed nations.
lenders.occupational_info:
SIFE is a global non-profit organization active in more than 40 countries. SIFE is funded by financial contributions from corporations, entrepreneurs, foundations, government agencies and individuals. Working in partnership with business and higher education, SIFE establishes student teams on university campuses. These teams are led by faculty advisors and they are challenged to develop community outreach projects that reach SIFE's five educational topics:

Market Economics 
Success Skills 
Entrepreneurship 
Financial Literacy 
Business Ethics

lenders.name: Figota Enterprises
lenders.loan_because: We believe that the spirit of Entrepreneurship should be kept alive on a Global scale.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I'm always willing to help others help themselves.  It's a pleasure and a privilege to have a means to do so.

lenders.name: Yemisrach
lenders.loan_because: the greatest social service that can be render by anybody to the country and to mankind is to bring up a family...by George Bernard Shaw.  I yearn to be trapped in humanity by helping others bring up their family. And most of all, I know that they will use the money more wisely than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in a Biotech/Diagnostic company in discovery, development, production and marketing of novel health care diagnostic medical devices and solutions.  And also, working closely with Kiva in exploring opportunities to establish Kiva partnership in Ethiopia.

lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a senior citizen who has been disabled with chronic illness for about 30 years. I have a company that manages the administrative work of my husband\\\\\\\'s consulting business. Together we raise little white dogs called Bichon Bolognese.

lenders.occupational_info: i am very polite ,truthfull and caring person,i always beleive that together we can make difference,because ,Iron sharpeneth Iron.

lenders.occupational_info: I hope that my work helps others love their work more.

lenders.name: TIES
lenders.loan_because: we realized that helping those who wish to better themselves, and their local area, by working smarter is the most effective way of evening the global economy.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a student run technological and entrepreneurial organization at the University of Missouri - Rolla.  We gather weekly to fullfil our needs to be enthusiastic about business ventures and new products and ideas.  Our group advisor saw a T.V. show on KIVA one day and suggested that we, as a group, give to one of KIVA\\\'s hopefuls.  The group quickly accepted this as a wonderful idea and within the month we have sent out two $25 loans.  Once these return (we are very optomistic) we will immediately reinvest an increased amount.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Evan

lenders.occupational_info: to teach languages/cultures to several areas of the world is a goal I am aiming for

lenders.name: Maryanne
lenders.loan_because: In 1994 I was working in another industry when I was laid off in a corporate merger.  I ended up having to change careers and needed $600. to go back to school to finish the real estate classes I needed to obtain my Appraisal License. For me, at that time in my life, $600 was a real deal breaker.  Because someone had faith in me and helped me many years ago by making that loan, I am in a position to help someone else today.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a licensed real estate appraiser in the State of Arizona.  I do residential real estate appraisal and own my own business.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Solidarity will make a change.
lenders.occupational_info: Happiness

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I have the luck to live in a secure and rich country, this is the minimum that I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a corporate library, I buy scientific e-books and databases, I search for interesting informations for our business (chemistry).

lenders.name: Danijel
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that small gestures of generosity can change somebody\'s life out there, somewhere far from me, who does not  get to enjoy the same luxury and the same meaningless scale of problems that I do. While I get to worry about things like work stress or small arguments, other people worry about having something to eat or feed their family with. So here is to making a world a bit of a happier place for some of them...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in one of the biggest consumer goods corporations in the world, in charge of managing several products with my team for an entire region in Europe. It\'s a stressful, but very fulfilling work... And I am happy to share a small fruit of that labor with those that don\\\'t get the opportunity to reap such fruits.

lenders.name: Octavio
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work.

lenders.name: michaela
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the chance, at bare minimum, to be self-sufficient. I would hope if I was in need someone would help me. A lot of life is luck. The rest is hard work. I've been lucky. I am grateful for that. And with that gratitude comes a desire to give back and "pay it forward." I admire all these people who are working so hard and trying to make their dreams come true against trying odds. I loan because... we are all connected and if someone on the other side of the planet can better their life, we are all better.

lenders.name: Everett
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.loan_because:

lenders.loan_because: I loaon because I can, and God give me the oportunity to live in the greatest country in the wide world USA. I came here with nothing, now I can help others in need. GOD Bless United States of America, Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave.

Dee encourages others to help out when you can and smile much.

lenders.name: Shane McP
lenders.loan_because: It is a hand up, not a hand out. People just need a chance to prove themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently the founder of an IT and computer service company. I also dabble in real estate.

lenders.name: Greg & Negin
lenders.loan_because: we figure if we can\'t be entrepreneurs ourselves, we should support people who can.
lenders.occupational_info: Greg is a graduate student working on his PhD in Computer Science.  Negin is a Criminalist who gathers and test samples from crime scenes to put the bad guys away.

lenders.name: Tore Brevik
lenders.loan_because: I think farmers around the world should get a opportunity to develope their farms to supply their families with all their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: Farmer with milk and meat as the main production at  the farm. Married with four fosterkids living with us on the farm at the moment.

lenders.name: Raj
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the single most effective form of poverty alleviation.

lenders.name: hanxue
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better himself/herself
lenders.occupational_info: I provide IT solutions to a multi-national company

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great concept to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with health, wealth and happiness and I wish to share a little bit of these with those who were not given the blessings that I have received.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired entrepreneur who is willing to give help to aspiring entrepreneurs throughout the world. Website link below shows where my loans are at work.

lenders.name: Silvana
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to go through hard times. I am from Bulgaria and my family has experienced financial problems in the early 90s. I think that helping out in this way is a really cool idea and has a huge potential worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: PhD student in Economics.

lenders.name: Nick Lucking
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans to the 3rd world interest me.
lenders.occupational_info: Thought Horse, Inc

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: A Christian man is the most free lord of all, and subject to none; a Christian man is the most dutiful servant of all, and subject to every one. --Martin Luther, 1520
lenders.occupational_info: My name's Anthony. I live in Orlando and I've studied microfinance/microcredit for three years with the hope of learning enough to start a nonprofit. I like lending cash to the food and agriculture sectors... farms, groceries, bakeries, cafes, markets, etc Brave women starting indie businesses are more likely to receive funding, but I'm also happy to fund groups and collectives. You should watch this great documentary, Globalisation is Good, by former anarchist Johann Norberg: http://tinyurl.com/5ea5ug and read his book In Defense of Global Capitalism Feel free to message me to discuss microfinance and share new ideas

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel better to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I  work in customer service for Fresh Start Bakeries which supplies bread to major fast food chains. I  process orders for Jack-In-The-Box . I am also married with five children. I know and understand that it is not always easy and every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It's all about giving a helping hand and being a part of something outside of myself

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I've been through hard times with very little money for essentials, but I didn't have the entrepreneurial spirit of the people on the KIVA website.  My admiration goes out to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I order books for my company.

lenders.name: Bree
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans are one of the best ways to empower people and begin to alleviate poverty throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead adventure trips around the world for a company called Explore Worldwide.  Check them out at    www.explore.co.uk

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who are hard-working and honest.

lenders.name: Søren Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I like the thoughts behind micro financing and think this is my way to make a sustainable difference in this world
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Copenhagen Business School studying Auditing

lenders.name: Tim Travis
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that in some small way I am helping to improve the quality of life for these hard-working entreprenuers and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entreprenuer--starting up a business--much like those who we support through Kiva.

lenders.name: Tuck
lenders.loan_because: To help people with their living
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in ninth grade and I care about others succeeding in life, so please take my loan and use it for your success.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nuclear engineering postdoc at the University of California - Berkeley.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: \"We can\'t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.\" Dr. Loretta Scott

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a web-tech company.

lenders.name: Dr. John and Marcia
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings of our life with others.  This idea is so beautiful in its\' simplicity, what a wonderful way to share the LOVE and change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: Operate Center of Life Chiropractic and Pilates Studio in a small town in Maryland and participate in global chiropractic out-reach missions.  The practice incorporates an Honor Fee that allows all individuals to access care regardless of economic situation.

lenders.name: Harmony
lenders.occupational_info: I test computer software programs and am passionate about the pursuit of software quality.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and feel good about themselves and what they are able to do.
lenders.occupational_info: When people have had difficult and terrible things happen in their lives, I try to help them have better lives through talk and other kinds of therapy.  These therapies help to change the way we view ourselves and the world, and lead to healing.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because:
When I needed it, Someone gave me a leg up.        
________Beware Of the Penguins!!!!!_______
lenders.occupational_info: My company does electrical & computer wiring for businesses and homes.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans stand a chance at changing lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and instructions that help people understand how to use technology, like computer software or cell phones.

lenders.name: Lyle & Zach
lenders.loan_because: What better way than to help those who are taking steps to change their world. When all is said and done, it is the small gestures to complete strangers that matter the most. It restores our humanity and it feels just great. It also helps my son Zach understand that he also can contribute through our combined loan and make a difference.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: In a recent trip to South Africa, I had a chance to visit seveal rural HIV clinics. In that trip I saw first hand the devastation of AIDS epidemic in Sub-Saharan Africa. Although we are far from a mdical cure, one of the mitigating factors in spread of HIV is poverty. This picture was taken in front of one of the clinics.

lenders.name: Emily aka crazycakes
lenders.loan_because: a little $$ to me is a lot to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: i have a small business. i make all sorts of pretty things to sell.

lenders.name: Celine
lenders.loan_because: Je prete car je veux supporter les gens qui sont prets a travailler fort pour aider leur famille.
